Package icyllis.arc3d.core

Class SLDataType

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.core.SLDataType
public final class SLDataType extends Object
Types of shader-language-specific boxed variables we can create, shared constants.

      public static int locationSize(byte type)
      Returns the number of locations take up by a given SLType. We assume that all scalar values are 32 bits.
